name: Looking for a NWN scripter for paid work!
author: ashflash69

posts.author: ashflash69
posts.content:
Hello! Well met! Etc

We have a growing persistent World and are in need of a good scripter to write some (probably pretty standard in the grand scheme of Nwns) complex scripting.

This is paid work, price negotiated per script.


Thanks!

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
These forums are all about character builds for NWN.

You would have better luck finding a scripter here: https://forum.neverwintervault.org/

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Finding a good scripter that is experienced with the NWN scripting system is going to be difficult imo.

Most moved on, long ago, to greener pastures.

posts.author: ashflash69
posts.content: Hah yep, we are definitely struggling to find someone, even with the promise of great riches

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Here is what I would suggest - try some of the famous programming school forums. They'll probably have to learn the NWN scripting system, but if they are worth anything, that should not prove difficult.

This is what I did, way back when.  Got a brilliant scripter that way.

He was the son of a Japanese diplomat.  Fell down the NWN rabbit hole so hard, he almost flunked out of college.

Lost him after he graduated.

And tbh, this is basically what you will need - someone with the time, energy, and interest.  And this basically means student.
